page.title: 14BAND OF HOPE DEMONSTRATION
page.content: The{Band of Hope}is an organization to try and stop people drinking alcohol. The{113th Demonstration }was held in Appleby on the 15th of June 1985.It used to be held in Kirkby Stephen. The demonstration consists of a procession,awards,speeches,football,sp orts and a fair. First I carried the Nateby and Wharton {banner}in the procession with my friend Ben.Earlier in the year we did some{Temperance Knowledge exams.}We had to know what damage alcohol does to the human body.I was awarded 40p and a certificate of merit by the new {Band of Hope Queen }kathryn Hastwell she made a speech about alcohol causing violence at football matches like at the Europeon cup final in Brussels this year, and car accidents. Then we played football.My team came runners up in the final.
